mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reserve(resident_id, num, time, createTime) values (#{resident_id}, #{num}, #{time}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select time from tbl_appointment order by time desc limit 0, 1
select count(1) from tbl_reserve r left join tbl_resident re on r.resident_id = re.id left join tbl_inoculation i on re.id = i.resident_id where re.idCard = #{idCard}
select count(1) from tbl_reserve where time = #{time}

select r.id, r.num, r.time, re.id as residentId, re.name, re.age, re.gender, re.phone, re.idCard from tbl_reserve r left join tbl_resident re on r.resident_id = re.id left join tbl_inoculation i on re.id = i.resident_id where re.idCard = #{idCard} or re.id = #{idCard}
